You need to edit the /etc/initramfs-tools/initramfs.conf file and change the 'MODULES=most' option to something appropriate for your computer.
Try 'MODULES=dep' first.  You need to regenerate the initrd before the change takes effect.  Note that you can make your computer unbootable by changing this option.
